SEARCH
Package photos.controller

Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
photos.controller.SearchController
public class SearchController extends Object
Controller for the search interface. Allows users to search for photos by tag or date range, display matching photos as a slideshow, similar to how it is in the album view, and optionally save them into a brand new album. Authored by Harshi Oleti.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the search UI by clearing inputs, messages, and previous search results

    • quitApplication

      public void quitApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      saves user data and quits application
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the quitButton button

    • parseDateStart

      private Calendar parseDateStart(String dateStr) throws ParseException
      Parses a start date from user input and returns a Calendar object. Sets the time to the beginning of the day.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - the date string in MM/dd/yyyy format
      Returns:
      a Calendar set to the parsed start date
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the input is not a valid date

    • parseDateEnd

      private Calendar parseDateEnd(String dateStr) throws ParseException
      Parses an end date from user input and returns a Calendar object. Sets the time to the end of the day.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - the date string in MM/dd/yyyy format
      Returns:
      a Calendar set to the parsed end date
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the input is not a valid date

    • searchByDate

      public void searchByDate(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Searches all user albums for photos taken within a specified date range. Validates date format, updates the search results, and displays them.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the searchDate button

    • searchByTag

      public void searchByTag(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Search for all albums associated with the current user for photos matching a single tag, or a combination of two tags using "and"/"or" logic. Validates the query format and updates the view.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the searchTag button.

    • findTaggedPhotos

      private Set<Photo> findTaggedPhotos(String tagName, String tagValue)
      Finds photos with the specified tag name and value from all albums associated with the current user.
      Parameters:
      tagName - is the tag type (name) to match
      tagValue - is the tag value to match
      Returns:
      a set of photos matching the tag criteria.

    • createAlbum

      public void createAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Creates a new album from the current search results. Automatically names it "search compilation #n" and adds all results.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the createButton button.

    • returnToHome

      public void returnToHome(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Returns to the home page from the search screen.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the returnButton button
